skill.name: clinvar-database
skill.description: Query NCBI ClinVar for variant clinical significance. Search by gene/position, interpret pathogenicity classifications, access via E-utilities API or FTP, annotate VCFs, for genomic medicine.
skill.summary: Query NCBI ClinVar for variant clinical significance. Search by gene/position, interpret pathogenici...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: The skill is documentation-only but includes a download-and-execute shell command and multiple network download examples. These patterns can enable arbitrary code execution if users run them without verification.

medium_findings.title: Remote script install command in docs
medium_findings.description: The documentation instructs: `sh -c "$(curl -fsSL ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/entrez/entrezdirect/install-edirect.sh)"` which downloads and executes a remote script. If the source is compromised, an attacker could execute arbitrary code on a user machine.

content.value_statement: ClinVar data is spread across web, API, and bulk files. This skill guides precise queries, interpretation, and downloads for reliable variant analysis.
actual_capabilities: Provide ClinVar search patterns for web and E-utilities queries
Explain clinical significance terms and review status stars
Describe FTP directory structure and data formats
Outline VCF annotation and filtering commands
Summarize how to handle conflicting interpretations
limitations: Does not provide medical diagnosis or clinical decisions
Does not fetch live ClinVar data by itself
Requires network access to NCBI services
Large downloads require local storage and tools

use_cases.title: Gene level variant review
use_cases.description: Find pathogenic variants for a gene and assess review status before analysis.

use_cases.title: Interpretation support
use_cases.description: Clarify ClinVar classifications and manage conflicting interpretations.

use_cases.title: Pipeline annotation planning
use_cases.description: Plan VCF annotation steps using ClinVar data files and tools.

prompt_templates.title: Quick ClinVar search
prompt_templates.scenario: Need a basic query for a gene
prompt_templates.prompt: Give a ClinVar web query for CFTR pathogenic variants and explain the search fields.

prompt_templates.title: Interpret significance
prompt_templates.prompt: Explain what VUS means in ClinVar and how review status changes confidence.

prompt_templates.title: Bulk download plan
prompt_templates.prompt: List FTP paths for the latest ClinVar XML and GRCh38 VCF and summarize the update schedule.

prompt_templates.title: Pipeline annotation
prompt_templates.prompt: Outline steps and example commands to annotate a VCF with ClinVar and filter pathogenic variants.

output_examples.input: Find high confidence pathogenic BRCA1 variants and explain how to prioritize them.
output: Search for BRCA1 pathogenic variants and filter for expert panel or practice guideline review status
Prioritize entries with three or four stars and no conflicting interpretations
Record the ClinVar release date used for the analysis

best_practices: Check review status and prefer higher star ratings
Record ClinVar version and access date for reproducibility
Use the correct genome build when selecting VCF files
anti_patterns: Treating VUS as diagnostic without expert review
Mixing GRCh37 and GRCh38 coordinates in one analysis

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. The content is platform agnostic and works in Claude, Codex, and Claude Code.

faq.question: What are the main limits of the skill?
faq.answer: It does not provide medical diagnosis and depends on external ClinVar access.

faq.question: Can it integrate with bioinformatics pipelines?
faq.answer: Yes. It provides guidance for VCF annotation and bulk data processing steps.

faq.question: Does it access or store my data?
faq.answer: No. It only provides guidance and does not collect or store user data.

faq.question: What should I do if an API request fails?
faq.answer: Check query syntax, respect rate limits, and retry with exponential backoff.

faq.question: How does this compare to the ClinVar website?
faq.answer: It adds structured query guidance, interpretation help, and bulk download workflows.
